GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Fix memory leak on ntfs_fill_super() error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit ff0df7d9cdbb12878155168b5234e99029e5377f. For more details please see the references link.
